root: ^_QUESTDONE_ WhereIsTheBusDriver I'm all about the trip.

c-0: ^The bus is late. And today is the last day of the fair. And I wanted so badly to get to it, and here we are.
^Today is the last day? I thought it would last another week.
^It sounds like you're as lost as I am. Listen, could you go to the bus driver's house and find out what happened?
^I don't know. What if, as soon as I leave, the bus will arrive? Then I won't get to the fair.
^He lives in a green house. Hurry up!
c-1: ^If the bus arrives earlier, I will ask the driver to wait.

c-0: ^Hurry up! I don't want to be there by closing time.
